articles.description: Decades on from the start of the HIV/AIDS pandemic, researchers are yet to crack a successful formula for a vaccine. But now we have eight COVID vaccines in 18 months, people are asking: Can we speed things up for HIV?
articles.content:
It is a search that has so far eluded scientists for 40 years: Finding a safe and effective vaccine to protect people from HIV.  
Not a single HIV vaccine has made it beyond Phase III clinical testi… [+10142 chars]
